Wear a hat: The most obvious solution would be to wear a hat that covers your entire head. This will protect your scalp from direct sunlight and prevent sunburn.
Use sunscreen: Apply a broad-spectrum sunscreen and make sure to reapply regularly. You can also use a spray-on sunscreen to protect your head from the sun.
Wear a scarf: Wrap a scarf around your head to protect your scalp from the sun. This will also add some style to your look.
Use a wig: If you're self-conscious about your hair loss, you can use a wig to cover your head. Make sure to choose a wig that is made of breathable materials and that fits comfortably.
Use a hair bandana: Wear a hair bandana around your head to protect your scalp from the sun. This will also add some color to your look.
